content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and help you recreate it using the block dictionary.

Structure Analysis:
- Total Blocks: 6 blocks
- Colors: Red (4 blocks), Yellow (2 blocks)
- Layers: 3 layers

Blocks Required (from dictionary):
1. Block 1 (Red curved arch) - Used twice for bottom layer
2. Block 2 (Red curved arch) - Used once in middle layer
3. Block 4 (Yellow rectangular block) - Used twice for middle and top layers
4. Block 12 (Orange triangular block) - Used once on top

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (Red curved arch)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (Red curved arch)
    Step3: Move block with index 4 (Yellow rectangular block)
    Step4: Move block with index 2 (Red curved arch)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (Yellow rectangular block)
    Step6: Move block with index 12 (Orange triangular block)
}

This sequence will recreate the structure exactly as shown in the main target image.
